- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)

### New Stone Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### Wooden Chest at position (5.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Chest (position 5.5, 0.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting into a furnace that is full
- Ensure to check the status of the furnace before inserting items. If the furnace is full, wait until it processes some items before adding more.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors when inserting into a furnace with no fuel
- Ensure that the furnace has fuel before attempting to insert items. If it is out of fuel, gather more fuel and insert it before adding items.

### Errors when inserting into a furnace with no ingredients
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before inserting fuel. If it has no ingredients, gather the required materials first.
